verses.verse: Now it came to <S%H1961>pass,<s%> <S%H834>when<s%> the <S%H2346>wall<s%> was <S%H1129>built,<s%> and I had set <S%H5975>up<s%> the <S%H1817>doors,<s%> and the <S%H7778>porters<s%> and the <S%H7891>singers<s%> and the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> were <S%H6485>appointed,<s%>

That I <S%H853>gave<s%> my <S%H251>brother<s%> <S%H2607>Hanani,<s%> and <S%H2608>Hananiah<s%> the <S%H8269>ruler<s%> of the <S%H1002>palace,<s%> <S%H6680>charge<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> <S%H3389>Jerusalem:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> <S%H1931>he<s%> was a <S%H571>faithful<s%> <S%H376>man,<s%> and <S%H3372>feared<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H430>God<s%> above <S%H4480>many.<s%> <S%H7227><s%>

And I <S%H559>said<s%> unto them, Let <S%H3808>not<s%> the <S%H8179>gates<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> be <S%H6605>opened<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> the <S%H8121>sun<s%> be <S%H2552>hot;<s%> and <S%H5704>while<s%> <S%H1992>they<s%> <S%H5975>stand<s%> by, let them <S%H1479>shut<s%> the <S%H1817>doors,<s%> and <S%H270>bar<s%> them: and <S%H5975>appoint<s%> <S%H4931>watches<s%> of the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem,<s%> every <S%H376>one<s%> in his <S%H4929>watch,<s%> and every <S%H376>one<s%> to be over <S%H5048>against<s%> his <S%H1004>house.<s%>

Now the <S%H5892>city<s%> was <S%H7342>large<s%> <S%H3027><s%> and <S%H1419>great:<s%> but the <S%H5971>people<s%> were <S%H4592>few<s%> <S%H8432>therein,<s%> and the <S%H1004>houses<s%> were <S%H369>not<s%> <S%H1129>built.<s%>

And my <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H5414>put<s%> <S%H413>into<s%> mine <S%H3820>heart<s%> to gather <S%H6908>together<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H2715>nobles,<s%> and the <S%H5461>rulers,<s%> and the <S%H5971>people,<s%> that they might be reckoned by <S%H3187>genealogy.<s%> And I <S%H4672>found<s%> a <S%H5612>register<s%> of the <S%H3188>genealogy<s%> of them which came <S%H5927>up<s%> at the <S%H7223>first,<s%> and <S%H4672>found<s%> <S%H3789>written<s%> therein,

These <S%H428><s%> are the <S%H1121>children<s%> of the <S%H4082>province,<s%> that went <S%H5927>up<s%> out of the <S%H4480>captivity,<s%> <S%H7628><s%> of those that had been carried <S%H1473>away,<s%> <S%H834>whom<s%> <S%H5019>Nebuchadnezzar<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon<s%> had carried <S%H1540>away,<s%> and came <S%H7725>again<s%> to <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> and to <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> every <S%H376>one<s%> unto his <S%H5892>city;<s%>

Who <S%H935>came<s%> <S%H5973>with<s%> <S%H2216>Zerubbabel,<s%> <S%H3442>Jeshua,<s%> <S%H5166>Nehemiah,<s%> <S%H5838>Azariah,<s%> <S%H7485>Raamiah,<s%> <S%H5167>Nahamani,<s%> <S%H4782>Mordecai,<s%> <S%H1114>Bilshan,<s%> <S%H4559>Mispereth,<s%> <S%H902>Bigvai,<s%> <S%H5149>Nehum,<s%> <S%H1196>Baanah.<s%> The <S%H4557>number,<s%> I say, of the <S%H376>men<s%> of the <S%H5971>people<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> was this;
The <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H6551>Parosh,<s%> two <S%H505>thousand<s%> a <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H7657>seventy<s%> and <S%H8147>two.<s%>
The <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H8203>Shephatiah,<s%> <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H7657>seventy<s%> and <S%H8147>two.<s%>
The <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H733>Arah,<s%> <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H2572>fifty<s%> and <S%H8147>two.<s%>

The <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H6355>Pahath-moab,<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3442>Jeshua<s%> and <S%H3097>Joab,<s%> two <S%H505>thousand<s%> and <S%H8083>eight<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> and <S%H8083>eighteen.<s%> <S%H6240><s%>
The <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H5867>Elam,<s%> a <S%H505>thousand<s%> two <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H2572>fifty<s%> and <S%H702>four.<s%>
The <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H2240>Zattu,<s%> <S%H8083>eight<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H705>forty<s%> and <S%H2568>five.<s%>
The <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H2140>Zaccai,<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> and <S%H8346>threescore.<s%>
The <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H1131>Binnui,<s%> <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H705>forty<s%> and <S%H8083>eight.<s%>
The <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H893>Bebai,<s%> <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H6242>twenty<s%> and <S%H8083>eight.<s%>
The <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H5803>Azgad,<s%> two <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H6242>twenty<s%> and <S%H8147>two.<s%>
The <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H140>Adonikam,<s%> <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H8346>threescore<s%> and <S%H7651>seven.<s%>
The <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H902>Bigvai,<s%> two <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H8346>threescore<s%> and <S%H7651>seven.<s%>
The <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H5720>Adin,<s%> <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H2572>fifty<s%> and <S%H2568>five.<s%>
The <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H333>Ater<s%> of <S%H2396>Hezekiah,<s%> <S%H8673>ninety<s%> and <S%H8083>eight.<s%>
The <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H2828>Hashum,<s%> <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H6242>twenty<s%> and <S%H8083>eight.<s%>
The <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H1209>Bezai,<s%> <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H6242>twenty<s%> and <S%H702>four.<s%>
The <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H2756>Hariph,<s%> a <S%H3967>hundred<s%> and <S%H8147>twelve.<s%> <S%H6240><s%>
The <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H1391>Gibeon,<s%> <S%H8673>ninety<s%> and <S%H2568>five.<s%>
The <S%H376>men<s%> of <S%H1035>Bethlehem<s%> and <S%H5199>Netophah,<s%> a <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H8084>fourscore<s%> and <S%H8083>eight.<s%>
The <S%H376>men<s%> of <S%H6068>Anathoth,<s%> a <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H6242>twenty<s%> and <S%H8083>eight.<s%>
The <S%H376>men<s%> of <S%H1041>Beth-azmaveth,<s%> <S%H705>forty<s%> and <S%H8147>two.<s%>
The <S%H376>men<s%> of <S%H7157>Kirjath-jearim,<s%> <S%H3716>Chephirah,<s%> and <S%H881>Beeroth,<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H705>forty<s%> and <S%H7969>three.<s%>
The <S%H376>men<s%> of <S%H7414>Ramah<s%> and <S%H1387>Geba,<s%> <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H6242>twenty<s%> and <S%H259>one.<s%>
The <S%H376>men<s%> of <S%H4363>Michmas,<s%> a <S%H3967>hundred<s%> and <S%H6242>twenty<s%> and <S%H8147>two.<s%>
The <S%H376>men<s%> of <S%H1008>Bethel<s%> and <S%H5857>Ai,<s%> a <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H6242>twenty<s%> and <S%H7969>three.<s%>
The <S%H376>men<s%> of the <S%H312>other<s%> <S%H5015>Nebo,<s%> <S%H2572>fifty<s%> and <S%H8147>two.<s%>
The <S%H1121>children<s%> of the <S%H312>other<s%> <S%H5867>Elam,<s%> a <S%H505>thousand<s%> two <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H2572>fifty<s%> and <S%H702>four.<s%>
The <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H2766>Harim,<s%> <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> and <S%H6242>twenty.<s%>
The <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3405>Jericho,<s%> <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H705>forty<s%> and <S%H2568>five.<s%>
The <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3850>Lod,<s%> <S%H2307>Hadid,<s%> and <S%H207>Ono,<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H6242>twenty<s%> and <S%H259>one.<s%>
The <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H5570>Senaah,<s%> <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H8672>nine<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> and <S%H7970>thirty.<s%>

The <S%H3548>priests:<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3048>Jedaiah,<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3442>Jeshua,<s%> <S%H8672>nine<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H7657>seventy<s%> and <S%H7969>three.<s%>
The <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H564>Immer,<s%> a <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H2572>fifty<s%> and <S%H8147>two.<s%>
The <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H6583>Pashur,<s%> a <S%H505>thousand<s%> two <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H705>forty<s%> and <S%H7651>seven.<s%>
The <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H2766>Harim,<s%> a <S%H505>thousand<s%> and <S%H7651>seventeen.<s%> <S%H6240><s%>

The <S%H3881>Levites:<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3442>Jeshua,<s%> of <S%H6934>Kadmiel,<s%> and of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H1937>Hodevah,<s%> <S%H7657>seventy<s%> and <S%H702>four.<s%>
The <S%H7891>singers:<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H623>Asaph,<s%> a <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H705>forty<s%> and <S%H8083>eight.<s%>

The <S%H7778>porters:<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H7967>Shallum,<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H333>Ater,<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H2929>Talmon,<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H6126>Akkub,<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H2410>Hatita,<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H7630>Shobai,<s%> a <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H7970>thirty<s%> and <S%H8083>eight.<s%>
The <S%H5411>Nethinims:<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H6727>Ziha,<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H2817>Hashupha,<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H2884>Tabbaoth,<s%>
The <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H7026>Keros,<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H5517>Sia,<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H6303>Padon,<s%>
The <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3838>Lebana,<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H2286>Hagaba,<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H8014>Shalmai,<s%>
The <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H2605>Hanan,<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H1435>Giddel,<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H1515>Gahar,<s%>
The <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H7211>Reaiah,<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H7526>Rezin,<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H5353>Nekoda,<s%>
The <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H1502>Gazzam,<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H5798>Uzza,<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H6454>Phaseah,<s%>
The <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H1153>Besai,<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H4586>Meunim,<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H5304>Nephishesim,<s%>
The <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H1227>Bakbuk,<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H2709>Hakupha,<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H2744>Harhur,<s%>
The <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H1213>Bazlith,<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H4240>Mehida,<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H2797>Harsha,<s%>
The <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H1302>Barkos,<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H5516>Sisera,<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H8547>Tamah,<s%>
The <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H5335>Neziah,<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H2412>Hatipha.<s%>

The <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H8010>Solomon's<s%> <S%H5650>servants:<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H5479>Sotai,<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H5618>Sophereth,<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H6514>Perida,<s%>
The <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3279>Jaala,<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H1874>Darkon,<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H1435>Giddel,<s%>

The <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H8203>Shephatiah,<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H2411>Hattil,<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H6380>Pochereth<s%> of <S%H6380>Zebaim,<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H526>Amon.<s%>

All <S%H3605><s%> the <S%H5411>Nethinims,<s%> and the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H8010>Solomon's<s%> <S%H5650>servants,<s%> were <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H8673>ninety<s%> and <S%H8147>two.<s%>

And <S%H428>these<s%> were they which went <S%H5927>up<s%> also from <S%H4480>Tel-melah,<s%> <S%H8528><s%> <S%H8521>Tel-haresha,<s%> <S%H3743>Cherub,<s%> <S%H114>Addon,<s%> and <S%H564>Immer:<s%> but they <S%H3201>could<s%> <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H5046>show<s%> their <S%H1>father's<s%> <S%H1004>house,<s%> nor their <S%H2233>seed,<s%> <S%H518>whether<s%> <S%H1992>they<s%> were of <S%H4480>Israel.<s%> <S%H3478><s%>

The <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H1806>Delaiah,<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H2900>Tobiah,<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H5353>Nekoda,<s%> <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H705>forty<s%> and <S%H8147>two.<s%>

And <S%H4480>of<s%> the <S%H3548>priests:<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H2252>Habaiah,<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H6976>Koz,<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H1271>Barzillai,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> one of the <S%H4480>daughters<s%> <S%H1323><s%> of <S%H1271>Barzillai<s%> the <S%H1569>Gileadite<s%> to <S%H802>wife,<s%> and was <S%H7121>called<s%> <S%H5921>after<s%> their <S%H8034>name.<s%>

These <S%H428><s%> <S%H1245>sought<s%> their <S%H3791>register<s%> among those that were reckoned by <S%H3187>genealogy,<s%> but it was <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H4672>found:<s%> therefore were they, as <S%H1351>polluted,<s%> put <S%H4480>from<s%> the <S%H3550>priesthood.<s%>

And the <S%H8660>Tirshatha<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto them, <S%H834>that<s%> they should <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H398>eat<s%> of the most holy <S%H4480>things,<s%> <S%H6944><s%> <S%H6944><s%> <S%H5704>till<s%> there <S%H5975>stood<s%> up a <S%H3548>priest<s%> with <S%H224>Urim<s%> and <S%H8550>Thummim.<s%>

The <S%H3605>whole<s%> <S%H6951>congregation<s%> <S%H259>together<s%> was <S%H702>forty<s%> <S%H7239><s%> and two <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> and <S%H8346>threescore,<s%>

Beside <S%H4480><s%> <S%H905><s%> their <S%H5650>menservants<s%> and their <S%H519>maidservants,<s%> of <S%H428>whom<s%> there were <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H7970>thirty<s%> and <S%H7651>seven:<s%> and they had two <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H705>forty<s%> and <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H7891>singing<s%> men and <S%H7891>singing<s%> women.

Their <S%H5483>horses,<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H7970>thirty<s%> and <S%H8337>six:<s%> their <S%H6505>mules,<s%> two <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H705>forty<s%> and five: <S%H2568><s%>

Their <S%H1581>camels,<s%> <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H7970>thirty<s%> and <S%H2568>five:<s%> <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> and <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H2543>asses.<s%>

And <S%H4480>some<s%> <S%H7117><s%> of the <S%H7218>chief<s%> of the <S%H1>fathers<s%> <S%H5414>gave<s%> unto the <S%H4399>work.<s%> The <S%H8660>Tirshatha<s%> <S%H5414>gave<s%> to the <S%H214>treasure<s%> a <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H1871>drams<s%> of <S%H2091>gold,<s%> <S%H2572>fifty<s%> <S%H4219>basins,<s%> <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> and <S%H7970>thirty<s%> <S%H3548>priests'<s%> <S%H3801>garments.<s%>
